11.content:
“My name is Jake. A pretty normal name right? Well I guess you could say I’m a pretty normal guy. Everybody else I know, not so much. The whole world makes me feel out of place, in the sense that almost everybody on the face of the Earth has the ability to eat each other! That might sound crazy to you, but for me it’s reality. As far back as I can remember, at least once a day I’ve seen somebody go down somebody else’s throat. I live on Earth, and we’ve got everything from people being giant blobs of fat and still hungering for more to anthropomorphic animals, or Furries as they are usually called. So yeah, Vore and other things like this are pretty common, but it still makes me feel out of place. Probably because I’m part of a small percentage of the population that can’t eat somebody whole. Lucky me. Now it might seem like guys like me would be extinct by now with practically everybody else on the planet being huge and hungry. However, people like me do serve other purposes that are pretty damn demeaning, but at least they keep us alive. Whether being turned into servants or love slaves or just simply falling in line, our fate is really determined by the kind of hungry people in our lives.”

Interesting…So how’s the family?
11.title: Jake the human

choices: So how close is Jake to his family?
Whoa! Look at that, time for school!
Don't want to deal with the family? Choose this option
111.content:
“My family, oh man where do I start with that?” Jake asked. Just as soon as he said that though, the blankets were pulled right off his head. This whole time he’d been lying in bed hidden beneath his covers for a little privacy, when who should show up but his older and rather annoying twin sisters.

“No way! Were you narrating? Tell us you weren’t narrating.” His sister Sally said with his other sister Alice finishing the last sentence. His twin siblings were two blonde bombshells, except in this world, that description included a couple hundred pounds. They were chubby to say the least, with curves everywhere, but many were in the best spots. Starting at their legs, they were definitely in the thunder thigh range, cratered with dimples in the fat which they always showed off by wearing short shorts or very short skirts. Their hips and waist were wide and rounded, swaying when they walked no matter what. Behind that of course, what took center stage were their behinds. Jiggling buns that shook like they had minds of their own, those asses perfectly completed their round lower regions. Their bellies were flabby guts composed of a few rolls and seemed to be getting a rounder shape to them everyday. Further up, their arms had thin layers of fat on them, but now it was the breasts that stole the show. Each was a perky DD Cup with tits that were just as round as the rest of the chests. Finally at their faces, both had cherubic cheeks which gave them a more innocent look even though neither sister was anywhere closer to that and a double chin completed the duo.

“No, I was…hey what are guys doing in my room?” Jake asked. He quickly turned the focus on them instead of himself. This wasn’t the first time somebody caught him talking to himself, just the first time his sisters did, and he knew they would not let him forget it. Personally, Jake didn’t see what the big deal was. So he sometimes narrated aspects of his life like somebody was watching him, didn’t everybody?

“Mom sent us up here, breakfast is ready.” Alice answered. At this point, Jake threw the covers off and rushed down the stairs. He knew well enough that if he didn’t get to the table before these two she devils that there would be nothing left. His mom and his aunt were likely already down there and that was risky enough when it comes to food. Alice and Sally giggled as they watched their little brother rushing off.

Soon both Jake and his sisters joined their mom and aunt at the breakfast table. Sitting right across from Sally and Alice was the mom, Monica. If you put the two of them together, then you’d get the size of their mom. Monica was a M.I.L.F. by many definitions. Even with three kids all in high school, she didn’t look a day over thirty. With dark brown hair and lovely brown eyes, she weighed over 300 pounds, and most of the fat she had was already added onto the weight she never shook from the kids. Her jugs were so big they looked they were still swollen from the milk all of the kids drank as babies. Her belly was a huge jiggling gut that hung down to her thighs and its size was a clear indication of where boyfriends and her husband went after the divorce. Another strong indication was the ones who got turned into ass fat. Her butt was so wide that the ass cheeks oozed off the sides of the chair and made her thong like panties practically disappear. Managing to contain her most jiggling parts in a mid thigh length black skirt and matching top, the only other thing covering her body was an apron that kind of made her look like she was straight out of the fifties. Of course, that was the only thing wholesome about her appearance and even though she was a very kind and loving mother, she maintained a VERY healthy libido and everybody knew it.

“Jake sweety, did you enjoy your pancakes?” she asked in a voice so sweet, you could get cavities from it. Looking a bit edgy, Jake soon saw his mom’s smile and it calmed him down. Even with an underlying issue about her that he knew would be brought up later today, he couldn’t hide how much of a momma’s boy he was…no matter how hard he tried.

“They were great, thanks mom.” He answered her. Chocolate chip pancakes with whip cream and strawberries on them and covered in sprinkles and blueberry syrup, nobody could turn that down. Being a BBW, his mom couldn’t help but make the most sugary, salty and fattening foods. However, while everyone else ate all the food on their plates and got fatter and fatter, Jake remained a simple 130 pounds no matter what. That was both a blessing and a curse for him.

“I don’t know why you waste your time feeding him.”
“Yeah, he’s so skinny, we could use him as a toothpick before we eat him.”
Alice and Sally insulted. Jake just let out an annoyed sigh. It was like clockwork with these two. It was always wake up, have breakfast, fight with his sisters, go to school. It never stopped, but even though Jake could usually take it with a comeback in mind, his mom decided to intervene this time.

“Alice, Sally, you stop teasing your brother this instant or I’m squashing both of you.” She threatened. That quickly shut them up and Jake chuckled. Having your mom fight your battles might sound embarrassing, but for him it was worth it since his mom always had the best punishments in mind for those two. The one she just threatened them with was trapping both of them underneath her rotund rear for as long as she wanted. Monica managed to keep this whole household running, but when she sat down, she could be there for hours. Once it was over, either her living chairs would pass out from eventually running out of air, suffer Monica’s gas attacks which often arose when ever she rested her behind or she’d just decide they’ve had enough.

“Oh come on sis,” everyone turned their heads to the other end of the table. “Let the boy settle things on his own, it’ll make him a man, a big, strong, tasty man.” Aunt Bertha licked her lips. Everybody just rolled their eyes at the only woman they knew who had a drink with breakfast. Well that and everything else on the table.

Monica’s sister, Bertha was in the simplest terms nearly immobile, and even with clothes her size and bigger in this reality, she preferred everyone to see her in her natural state. The only part of her that didn’t look like it was one hundred percent fat was her face, which was more like fifty percent. She had short hair that was a darker blonde than Sally and Alice had. Her cheeks were round and chubby like a chipmunk and she seemed to grow a new chin each day. That was where the light amount of fat ended though. Further down, her neck alone looked like it had disappeared into her blubbery lump of a body. Her boobs were the size of basketballs, and each one with a tit the size of a shot glass. They jiggled and flopped atop the sea of blubber that was her belly. Completely hiding her wide waist, this gut was only inches from touching the floor and even more fat from it seemed to ooze forward when ever she sat her enormous ass down. Beneath her fatty back, that behemoth sized behind was an awe inspiring sight wider than any member of the family and somehow surpassed her belly in size. Spending all of her time lounging around and eating, aunt Bertha’s ass grew with each passing. When she sat, her cheeks squished and lifted up against her seat, making them look like fleshy hills. They jiggled when she farted and even the slightest movement could cause them to go into a wobbling fit. It took a specially designed chair to hold her weight and even its size was no match for her humongous heiney, whose ass fat hung off the sides when she sat down. Yet, despite being so obese, aunt Bertha was still able to walk and get around. Granted, she was perfectly content with sitting on her fat ass as long as there was food and preferably alcohol nearby, but despite her snail pace speed, her thighs, which were so humongous they merely seemed to be containers for extra ass fat rubbed loudly and proudly when ever she decided to waddle.

“Oh Bertha, why do insist on drinking at 7:30 in the morning?” Monica frustratingly asked her sister. Bertha responded by smiling and shrugging, soon followed by downing a whole bottle of whine and hiccupping. Monica sighed, she could usually handle her loose sibling most of the time, but she’d like just one meal where Bertha’s drinking or hormones didn’t ruin it for everyone. Granted her appetite was impressive and very admirable, but even that wasn’t a big enough excuse.

“Say Jake, don’t suppose your morning wood is still with us?” Aunt Bertha asked while licking her lips again and this time fondling her bare boobies. Rather than cringing in utter disgust and choosing his therapist, Jake just rolled his eyes and said “Maybe later.”

Aside from the biggest appetite on the block, Aunt Bertha was also a legend for her bedroom action. It didn’t matter who she slept with, man or woman, animal, vegetable, or mineral, she was always the talk of the town. Her huge body offered so many possibilities but that also came with many dangers. No one knew what horrors joined the pleasures the lover of the day experienced, because often no one lived to tell the tale. Some say that while in the missionary position, one thrust too many would send you right into her thousands of fat folds, where you would be absorbed and lost forever. Others say that when she sucked someone up her ass, they were instantly turned to fat and their screams could be heard within her farts. Still others said that when she unbirthed someone, they never came back out and instead were melted down into her lust.
111.title: Meet the family

1112.content:
“Note to self, stop narrating everything,” Jake mumbled as he eyed his family warily. His sisters were grinning devilishly and whispering to each other so Jake wouldn’t know what they had planned. His mother was just looking at him carefully, a blush growing quickly on her chubby cheeks. Aunt Bertha was licking clean her eighth pancake off her drooping chops and was now leaning closer to Jake with a big perverted smile. Being at the center of his hormonal and hungry family was started to scare Jake, until he noticed the time and found something else to be scared about.

“Shit! I’m late!” Jake cry out when he noticed the time. His perverted family was easy to deal with compared to missing class, especially when detention often involved spending time with lonely, hungry teachers and delinquent anthro teens.

“Jake, watch what you say!” His mother scolded before turning her chubby head around and noticed the time. “Fuck, you kids are going to be late for school. Would you like me to give you a lift?”

“No,” the twins quickly said at the same time. Monica was a good mother, but she often made poor choices. Getting a small two seat car that could barely fit her was one of her numerous mistakes. She could barely fit her huge ass inside the tiny car and when she tried to stuff her whole family in, they ended up being squeezed together like sardines. The twins may have loved squishing their baby brother, but not if they had to be squished as well.

“If we hurry we can make it on time,” Sally quickly said as she stuffed half a pancake into her wide mouth and quickly swallowed.

“We’ll make sure Jake makes it on time as well. We’ll show him out favorite shortcut,” Alice said, stifling a giggle. They had a very good short cut to show their brother, one they had taken with a few other boys who disappeared suddenly. They were sure Jake would love seeing this special route.

“Girls, Jake has already left.”

The twins turned to where their brother had been sitting and saw his chair was vacant. They looked across the room to where his bag had been resting and that was gone too. “Damn!” they cried out in simultaneously, seeing that they missed their chance to walk their brother to school.

“Watch your language. Now get your asses out the door before your late for class and I have to hear your teacher bitch about you being tardy,” Their mother said sweetly, pointing her thick, sausage shaped finger towards the door. The twins grumbled but left, leaving their mother to clean up the mess they had left for her. Staring at the dirty plates, messy tabletop and Jakes not half finished breakfast, Monica sighed.

“Kids,” Aunt Bertha chuckled. “Can’t live with them, can’t not want to cover them in chocolate and have your way with them.”




“Running! Running! Running! Running! Running!” Jake loudly chanted as he made it three blocks from his house in only a few minutes. He wasn’t in a hurry just to get to school, he was also running because he had promised to meet someone in front of school ten minutes before it started. A female someone, and if Jake had learned one thing from growing up with four women, it was never, ever, ever make a girl wait.

Jake’s life might seem hard, but he had it easy compared to some other peoples life. The average lifespan for someone incapable of eating other people was thirty. The average lifespan of someone incapable of eating other people and male was twenty. The average lifespan of someone incapable of eating other people and male and living with four hungry women and in an area where more then three fourths can eat him, well, Jake should have never made it past kindergarten. He’s been very lucky, but there have been some really close calls. Jake has stared down more gapping mouths then a dentist. Been smothered under fat asses more times then he could count. Also, nearly been raped by every female in the district including his family. He has survived by the skin of his teeth and is going to keep surviving. Besides, if he ended up dead, his mom would kill him. Life wasn’t easy, but it was his life.

Jake made it to the front of his school with seconds to spare. He had made it on time for his meeting and hadn’t broken his promise. One of the biggest secrets to survival was never breaking your word because that tends to upset women and when you upset women you tend to end up as fat in their asses. Jake was there, ready to meet the girl, but she wasn’t any ordinary girl. She was a very special person to Jake.
1112.title: Life as he Knows it

11122.content:
“You know what I like about you Jakey? Aside from how delicious you are, you’re so reliable.” She said. Stopping his panting, Jake managed to look up and see the 350 pound mass that was his girlfriend. A very wide and very bouncy belly made up most of her front, unrestrained from her loosened black top as it could barely hold her F-Cup boobies which jiggled so much there might as well be nothing there. Back to her belly, its many love handles oozed over her tight, aqua colored skirt, which succeeded in hiding her crotch, but nothing else. Jutting out like a bumper was the only part of her body that came close to almost matching up to her gut, her ass. Two enormous cheeks made of pure fat made the rear, each wobbling and smacking against the other with ever slight movement. Her white panties were regular underwear, well as regular as ones that big could be, but they rode up her ass like a thong, exposing everything she had when ever the wind blew or if she bent over. To carry these and many other large compilations of fat were her tree trunk like legs that rubbed together loudly when ever she walked. Appearing to contain extra fat from her enormous hips, if those limbs got any bigger they’d probably swallow up her feet. Finally it came to her face which like everything else was bloated with creamy white blubber. Beneath her raven black hair were two cherub like cheeks that looked like they belonged to one of the chipmunk anthros than a human and a double chin completed the look. Her abundant and abundantly exposed fat was tempting enough, but what really got to Jake was that with her outfit and ethnicity, she perfectly pulled off the Asian schoolgirl look, and being a huge anime and manga fan, he could not resist.

Crystal was her name, one of the in-crowd here at the high school, and being with her, so was Jake. Somehow he had lucked out in being in a relationship with a cheerleader. At least, other people said it was luck.

“Thanks. Hey Crystal, I was wondering, why do you want me to show up early to school like this?” Jake asked. It was strange, one day Crystal just came up to him and said that he had to be at this spot exactly ten minutes before school everyday. She took Jake’s surprised sputters as a yes.

“Just want to make sure my man stays undigested. You know how hungry some of us can be.” Crystal spoke while licking her lips creepily. In truth, she just liked messing with Jake, seeing how much he was under her thumb and would do what she said. It was the reason she chose him after all.

*Flashback*

“Go Team go! Show ‘em whatcha got! Come on Team! Eat ‘em alive!” the cheerleaders shouted. As if having the hottest girls around shaking those pompoms, among other things around wasn’t great enough, this school was the first one to actually copyright the phrase “Eat ‘em alive.” successfully making them the envy of any school throughout the country. Shortly after that last cheer, the game was one, and the home team emerged victorious.

Gratified as anyone else from the victory, Crystal was also relieved that now she could get back to shaking her stuff strictly to find a man. She was now the only one of the squad who didn’t have a significant, or at least insignificant other, a fact that her best friend often rubbed in her face.

“Moose, sweetheart!” her BFF, Brieana the Wolfgirl was right next to her, wrapping her fat form and her lips all over her boyfriend the quarterback, Moose. Despite his name he looked normal…enough, but there was a rumor that he had his antlers surgically removed.

“Ugh, get a room.” Crystal told them. Brieana in turn, much to Moose’s disappointment, stopped making out with him to scowl at her friend. Crystal seemed like such a hypocrite right now as Brieana knew fully well that if she was in her place, she’d be doing to the same thing, and much more.

Letting out an exasperated sigh, Brieana quickly pointed out her friend’s problem to herself “You know what your problem is? You are way too picky when it comes to boy toys. Meal wise you’ll eat anyone, but as for kissing and screwing, not so much. I mean come on, you could get anyone. Why not somebody like my man Moose?” As she leaned on his wide shoulders, Crystal just rolled her eyes. This wasn’t the first time one of her friends tried to help her find somebody, but when ever their attempts failed, they always said she was too picky. The truth was Crystal would not settle for just anyone, even though she could get anyone.

She wanted someone a little, different, or in other words, she wanted someone she could completely control. A guy like Moose isn’t exactly the sharpest tack in the box, but despite that he can be independent. Not to mention that Crystal believes that no man should match up to a woman, like how Moose’s muscles matched up to how beautifully fat Brieana is.

“Hey dweeb!” At this point, said all brawn and just a few brain cells spotted one of the lagging spectators stumbling down the steps of the bleachers. It seemed waiting for the crowd to thin out before leaving had not been a good idea tonight as Moose grabbed a football and chucked towards the guy. That unfortunate soul that night was Jake of course and with no time to react he was hit in the head, causing him to fall over the guard rail and onto the field.

While Brieana and Moose, along with anyone else on the team or squad were laughing their asses off, Crystal saw a perfect opportunity. Bounding forward, her whole body jiggling inside that skimpy uniform, she soon arrived at Jake’s side. By the time the last tremor from that heavy body shook the ground, he started to come around.

The first thing Jake saw was this gorgeously chubby face outlined by the starry sky “Hi cutie.” Then, to the shock and horror of her friends, as they hope she’s just trying to eat that nobody, the two of them start making out right there in the field.

“From there on out, Jake couldn’t keep his hands off me. Who could blame him? Long after everyone else left, we did it right there in the football field. Jake really surprised me I can tell you that. At some points it felt like he was groping me with ten hands and for such a skinny guy, at least one part of him is huge, if you know what I mean. Later on we did it in the cafeteria, the girl’s bathroom, the girl’s locker room, I’ve even been trying to talk him into asking his aunt if we could…”

“ *Snap* *Snap* Crystal?” Jake said snapping his fingers in front of her face, effectively making her look him in the eye. “You zoned out there for like a minute…were you having a flashback?” he asked. It was really funny to see Crystal’s cheeks get so flushed.

“Hey at least I’m not a narrator.” She came back with.
11122.title: Crystal

111221.content:
The school bell suddenly rang loud and shrill, interrupting the two teens' banter.
"Crap, I gotta head off now." Jake apologized, giving Crystal a kiss on the cheek. "You know how the teachers get when someone's late."
"-Sigh- Alright, alright." The immense girl grumbled. "Can't have anyone else eating you just yet, that's my job."
"You know it, babe." Jake grinned. "I'll see you after school, okay?"
"Fine, just... don't end up in someone's rectum, alright?" Crystal asked; with that, she turned and moved her bulk into the school, heading off to her first class of the day.
"Alright, now what to I have first period again?" Jake asked himself.
111221.title: Saved by the bell

111222.content:
Crystal gave Jake a dirty look, not enjoying the condescending tone she’d heard. Speaking out of turn was a big no-no for their relationship. As well as saying words like no, I’m out of money and I’m too tired to get it up. Jake had no illusions about his relationship with Crystal. He knew she only was with him because he would do whatever she said, give her anything she wanted and screw her senseless whenever she wanted him to. Jake didn’t mind the treatment though, as long as he got to keep doing the last part with Crystal.

The only thing that really got him was when she put him in danger for her own entrainment. Crystal loved sending him on dangerous missions into areas most males only get to see before they are eaten. Jake had been sent into the cheerleaders changing room to retrieve a comb Crystal had leant her friend Sally, snuck into the teachers lounge to steal the next algebra test and was even made to sneak into his aunt room while she was asleep and steal a pair of her thong panties. Crystal loved watching him get put into life threatening situations. Jake wanted to refuse, but that would only put his life in danger with Crystal. He could see her thinking up a new job for him to do that would put him into the crosshairs of hungry girls, when he saw his salvation.

“Sandy! Over here! Sandy!” Jake cried out as he waved his arms around to grab the attention of the person he was calling out to. Instantaneously, Crystal forgot about whatever dastardly thing that was on her mind and frowned. She hated Sandy, but couldn’t force Jake to not see her. If she asked him to forget about her, it would prove that the girl mattered, which she didn’t. So Crystal learned to accept her, knowing that Jake’s eyes would always belong on her.

“Morning Jake,” a soft, feminine voice called out from the crowd. Quickly, the girl Jake considered his best friend scuttled towards him, slowed down by the nearly dozen books tucked under her arm. Sandra McEow or Sandy to her only friend was not like Crystal or Jakes family or most other girls. She was a dumpy young lady, always wearing a large sweater and loose pants with sneakers. She never wore a dress or skirt, barley showing any flesh at all in all the years Jake had known her. She was short too, only five feet tall, even a scrawny guy like Jake had to look down on her. She had a cute face, with short blond hair stopping at the nape of her neck. A large pair of glasses with thick black sides covered her eyes as she peered out of them nervously. She looked like a normal, nerdy girl, except for the fact that she was a Neko.

Nekos, or as most call them Catgirls, looked like normal humans, but with cat like features. A long white tail swayed behind Sandy as she walked, nearly tripping her several times. Her nails were longer, but she tried to keep them cut. A pair of cute cat ears stuck out from her mess of blond hair and a pair of tiny fangs gleamed inside her mouth. When Sandy got upset or flustered, her eyes would go gold and her pupils would become slits, but since Sandy was such a calm person, Jake had only witnessed her eyes change a few times. As a catgirl, people like Jake were usually Sandy’s main source of food. However, this catgirl had many quarks, one of them being that she was a vegetarian. Meat never touched her lips, she never explained her reasons for choosing that life style, but Jake assumed that it was because the thought of taking a life scared her. Sandy was such a timid, quiet girl, the perfect friend for a social outcast like Jake.

Stepping up to Jake, Sandy took several deep breathes from running across the room to Jake. Under her arm, advanced math and English books weighed her down. Regaining her composure, she brushed away a stray lock of blond hair from her eyes and smiled softly at Jake. “You’re here early? You’re never here early. What’s the occasion Jake?”

“Crystal told me to come early and I’d be a fool not to listen to her,” Jake smoothly said, reaching over to sling his arm over his girlfriend’s shoulders. Usually Crystal didn’t like being touched unless they were making out, but she’d let it go now just to see the look of disappointment written on miss catnerd’s frumpy face. She smiled sweetly at the tiny catgirl, relishing this victory over the much more inferior girl.

“Oh, good,” Sandy distractedly responded. She wouldn’t mention that she had been asking Jake for years to come early to school, she wouldn’t. Feeling incredibly awkward with Crystal glaring at her, Sandy started backing away. “I guess I’ll see you in class in a bit. Bye”

“Hold it!” Jake called out, gently placing his hand on Sandy’s shoulder to keep her from leaving. “We got the same class, we might as well go together,” Jake earnestly told Sandy, smiling slightly at her. Him and Sandy hadn’t been as close since he started dating Crystal, which had been bothering Jake’s conscience a lot lately. Sandy and him had been as tight as thieves since they were little kids. It seemed stupid to let that rich friendship end just because he was moving up in the world. Jake wanted to have a cool, hot girlfriend and his best friend, that wasn’t too unreasonable.

This is unreasonable, was what Crystal thought as her boyfriend put his hand on the lower class catgirl. She was supposed to be Jakes only real source of social interaction. No one else was supposed to even come close to him without her say so, especially such a nerd like McEow. If Jake hung out around a dweeb like her it made him look uncool and if he looked uncool, she looked uncool and nothing about her was uncool. Crossing her arms over her huge chest, Crystal looked with disgust at the smaller girl, until she decided to end the little moment with a question she knew would have Jakes attention.

Pulling Jake away from Sandy with a jerk, Crystal slung a large, jiggly arm around his neck, pressing her chest up against hers. Jake’s interest immediately shifted to her, his full attention grabbed by the prospect of more physical contact, but Crystal wanted something beside a good fuck right now. “Jakie-poo, I need a couple hundred for a new dress. You got some cash on you?”
111222.title: Meet Sandy the Nerdy Catgirl

choices: Jake's homeroom is a vore class
What's lunch time like on Vore World Earth?
1112221.content:
“Oh yeah, sure.” As if by reflex, Jake pulled his wallet out of his pocket. Upon opening it, he handed Crystal three one hundred dollar bills, and if the smile on her face was any bigger, it would have torn her chubby cheeks apart.

Being one of the quote unquote normal people, Jake’s mother fully understood why he would always need a fat wallet while dating somebody as fat as Crystal. Girls like her always strive to own the most glamorous and expensive things, not to mention that when ever they decided to eat normal food, they didn’t stop until one more bite would make them burst. While Monica felt like that first part meant better parenting on important values was required for that girl, she’d be damned if she would refuse to financially ensure that her baby kept his girlfriend happy and therefore kept himself uneaten. Thankfully she had plenty of money, but how exactly? We’ll get into that later.

As Sandra looked on with disappointment over her friend’s actions, even though she knew he was doing the safe thing, she soon spotted yet another money grubbing cheerleader heading in this direction. Just as Crystal stuffed the moolah into her cleavage, Brieana came up from behind.

“Hey Crystal!...Oh hi Jake.” Brieana greeted her BFF and not giving her loser boyfriend a second look. She didn’t even acknowledge that Sandra was even there.

“Hey now, show some respect. There is a reason I keep him around you know.” Crystal spoke. The look in her eyes suggested she was talking about what she and Jake did in private, but then she flashed the green and Brieana was drooling like she’d just seen an overweight horse.

Jake smiled, that was one of the very rare instances where Crystal actually cared about people respecting him. The reason was tainted but he enjoyed it, especially since it ended so soon.

“Jakey, I’m going to head off with Brieana alright?” she said. It didn’t matter what his answer was, there was no way she was going to walk to class with McEow next to her. Sure they had the same homeroom together, but that was torture enough. Heck, maybe she and Brieana would just skip homeroom to make it to the mall and make sure they got first dibs on the best clothes.

Before she left though, she decided to give her man a goodbye kiss. Lightly squished into her jutting tummy, Jake’s lips met with Crystal’s full man eating ones. However, what was meant to a simple lip lock turned into much more as Crystal wrapped her arms around her whipped boy, deepening the kiss and further squishing him into her belly. Just feeling all that warm fat around his body drove Jake crazy and he managed to reach around his girlfriend’s wide frame and grope at her skirt, grasping handfuls of her clothed and abundant ass fat. Loud smacking and sucking noises were heard as they kept it up and people walking by couldn’t help but stare. Brieana and Sandra meanwhile looked away, finding it hard to watch even before this turned into a full make out session. Not to mention they could clearly see the pointy object pushing into Crystal’s drooping gut. Fortunately for them, before things got too heated, she stopped.

“See you later Jakey.” She whispered before licking his lips. Finally she walked off with Brieana, everyone’s attention suddenly shifting to her practically bare ass cheeks, which came into view every three steps from the way her short skirt fluttered.

After tasting her remaining saliva still on his tongue, Jake shook his head and remembered he had to get to class. Turning around, he saw Sandy with her eyes still covered. I can’t say I approve of you sleeping with the livestock, but they seem to like you.” It was then that Jake noticed Spot sniffing his hand and then rubbing her chubby cheek against him, and what ever smeared on her she’d gladly lick off. “So, I’m not fired?” Jake asked hopefully, and Millie told him “Well I’ll let you stick around for a little while longer, but that means you’re gonna have to work twice as hard tomorrow since you spent all of today lounging around in my pig.” Jake gladly nodded and Sandy squealed “Oh Jake,” Overjoyed, the two lovers embraced each other in a wet and sloppy hug. “There’s just one little thing.” Sandy and Jake’s eyes popped open as they looked back, wondering what Ms. Warren had in store for them now.

“No problem Jake, I hope those clothes are alright for now.” She said. Jake had on some of her late husband’s old clothes and while the shirt was baggy, the belt made the pants an alright fit. Jake didn’t care about how he looked right now, only on getting his hands on one of Millie’s cookies, which he quickly snatched up. Millie was delighted to see him enjoy her baking and after basking the warm and gooey chocolate chips, he saw that a newspaper was on the table.

“Hey, mind if I check out the funnies?” he asked and Millie nodded. Just as Jake wad about to check out today’s Garfield though, he spotted the Entertainment section in the corner of his eye, and what he saw made him drop the funnies and quickly snatch up the other paper.

Jake!”
